channel.title: Ddos protection and setting up proxy - Please Help
channel.description: so i had to delete all my hide my ip programs and proxys to hide my ip from players, because it was making different ip's and they couldnt play public, now i get ddos'd by randomers who dont get what they want, how can i prevent this so i can set it up with a proxy ip? really need help

item.title: Ddos protection and setting up proxy - Please Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Moparian The Moparian
item.description:
@The_Moparian wrote:

DDOS implies that is a combined effort from either a bot net or packets from multiple computers. I highly doubt this is the case. Is it possible that your network can’t handle the down/upstream your server is demanding?

Read full topic
item.source: Ddos protection and setting up proxy - Please Help
